ingredients: Pesto (you can make your own, or use premade)
French Baguette(you can get a plain one, or an “everything” one like we did)
1 Tbsp. Fresh Basil (you can use the prepackaged tubes, or fresh. We intended on using fresh, but the stores were out of stock. Either one works great)
Mozzarella Cheese, sliced(you can more or less, but we put a small pack in.)
Lettuce or Salad Mix of your choice
